response.overview: Riding across Manhattan in a stretch limo during a riot in order to get a haircut, a 28-year-old billionaire asset manager's life begins to crumble.
response.tagline: How far can he go before he goes too far?
response.title: Cosmopolis

release_dates.note: New York City, NY & Los Angeles, CA
